channel.title: {PI} player log out error please help!
channel.description:
Okay in the runserver cmd when somebody logs out of the server it will say this for ever and keep repeating it.
at server.Server.main(Server.java:152) Game saved for player Fatal Pker java.lang.NullPointerException at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Client.java:152) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:326) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:129)
Does anybody know how to help please help?

item.title: {PI} player log out error please help!
item.dc:creator: @dancey88 dancey88

Game saved for player Fatal Pker
java.lang.NullPointerException

Does anybody know how to help please help?
